channel.title: computer generated imagery on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in computer generated imagery on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Mental Images Logo
Mental Images GmbH was a German computer generated imagery software firm based in Berlin, Germany, and was acquired by NVIDIA in 2007, then rebranded as NVIDIA Advanced Rendering Center, and is still providing similar products and technology. The company provides rendering and 3D modeling technology for entertainment, computer-aided design, scientific visualization and architecture. The company was founded by the physicists and computer scientists Rolf Herken, Hans-Christian Hege, Robert Hödicke and Wolfgang Krüger and the economists Günter Ansorge, Frank Schnöckel and Hans Peter Plettner as a company with limited liability & private limited partnership in April 1986 in Berlin, Germany.
You can download theMental Imageslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Mental Images
item.description: Mental Images GmbH was a German computer generated imagery software firm based in Berlin, Germany, and was acquired by NVIDIA in 2007, then rebranded as NVIDIA Advanced Rendering Center, and is still providing similar products and technology. The company provides rendering and 3D modeling technology for entertainment, computer-aided design, scientific visualization and architecture. The company was founded by the physicists and computer scientists Rolf Herken, Hans-Christian Hege, Robert Hödicke and Wolfgang Krüger and the economists Günter Ansorge, Frank Schnöckel and Hans Peter Plettner as a company with limited liability & private limited partnership in April 1986 in Berlin, Germany.
